name: io.github.ryanmat/logicmonitor
description: LogicMonitor API integration with 215 tools for alerts, devices, dashboards, traces, Ansible Automation Platform, and more.

environmentVariables.name: LM_ACCESS_ID
environmentVariables.description: LMv1 API access ID (required for log/metric ingestion)

environmentVariables.name: LM_ACCESS_KEY
environmentVariables.description: LMv1 API access key (required for log/metric ingestion)

environmentVariables.name: LM_ENABLED_TOOLS
environmentVariables.description: Comma-separated tool names or glob patterns to enable (e.g., get_*,create_device)

environmentVariables.name: LM_DISABLED_TOOLS
environmentVariables.description: Comma-separated tool names or glob patterns to disable (e.g., delete_*)

environmentVariables.name: LM_LOG_LEVEL
environmentVariables.description: Logging level for API request debugging (debug, info, warning, error)

environmentVariables.name: AWX_URL
environmentVariables.description: Ansible Automation Platform controller URL (e.g., https://aap.example.com). Optional â€” AAP tools excluded if not set.

environmentVariables.name: AWX_TOKEN
environmentVariables.description: Ansible Automation Platform personal access token

environmentVariables.name: AWX_VERIFY_SSL
environmentVariables.description: Verify SSL certificates for AAP connections (default: true)

environmentVariables.name: AWX_TIMEOUT
environmentVariables.description: Request timeout in seconds for AAP API calls (default: 30)

environmentVariables.name: AWX_MAX_RETRIES
environmentVariables.description: Max retries for failed AAP API requests (default: 3)
